exceptions.tactic: induction m as [| [a n] m' IHm].

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce unique_key to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce unique_key to an evaluable reference.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

original: intros. induction m as [| [a n] m' IHm]. - unfold restrict_code, unique_key. simpl. auto. - unfold restrict_code, unique_key. simpl. split. + intros [[x lx] [y ly] H1 H2]. inversion H1; inversion H2; subst. apply find_code_correct2 in H6 as <-. apply find_code_correct2 in H7 as <-. apply IHm. auto. + intros H. apply (frequency_list_in _ _ (a, n) n) in H as Hin. apply frequency_number_of_occurrences in Hin as [x H1]. apply (frequency_list_unique _ _ m') in H1. apply add_frequency_list_in in H1. apply IHm. auto.
